channel.title: Death through Party
channel.description: #### What happened? Prince was Possessed and attacked me, because he is occupy immune the attack went through. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Honestly this is up to the game designers on how they want party to work. If you get visited/attacked by anyone who is occupy immune, party will fail.

item.title: Death through Party
item.dc:creator: eevee
item.description:
Exactly what you said.

Party is just occupation. Every occupation immune class can attack you through it.
That’s totaly fine and was designed this way.

Read full topic

item.title: Death through Party
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Possessor is Occupy immune. Party won’t stop their attack on you.

Party doesn’t stop Occupy immune classes targeting you.

Read full topic

item.title: Death through Party
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
Was there a Possessor? That happened to me last night when I was killed by using party, and that breaks immunity.

Read full topic

item.title: Death through Party
item.dc:creator: XeonZenn
item.description:
What happened?

Prince was Possessed and attacked me, because he is occupy immune the attack went through.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Honestly this is up to the game designers on how they want party to work. If you get visited/attacked by anyone who is occupy immune, party will fail.

Read full topic
